New Records: India posted their highest T20I total against Australia with a score of 208/6.
Hardik Pandya scored his career-best 71* in T20Is.
Key Match Events: Hardik Pandya smashed a 30-ball 71* to help India post their highest T20I score against Australia.
Rahul and Suryakumar Yadav forged a solid partnership of 68 runs for the third wicket.
KL Rahul struck his 18th T20I half-century and became the fifth Indian batter to score 2000 runs in T20Is.
India scored 60 runs in the last four overs thanks to Hardik Pandya's clean hitting.
